title: Quiver Collective with Hans Rey shows us his n + 1 bicycle collection
content:
It’s not surprising that someone like Hans Rey has a lot of bikes. His legendary career spans decades, and he’s still inspiring us with his latest video series. But it may be a surprise to just how much of his two wheeled history he’s kept in the garage – including a broken GT Zaskar LE […]

The post Quiver Collective with Hans Rey shows us his n + 1 bicycle collection appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
